feed.title: Doug’s Dabblings
feed.subtitle: A collection of thoughts on things in my life that I'm experiencing, playing with, or suffering through. Mostly tech related, but sometimes not.

entry.title: Making use of gists
entry.content: After stumbling upon an example of how to do so, I’ve converted all my existing blog posts to use GitHub Gists instead of inline code blocks. It gives me added functionality, and reduces the size of the blog pages as well. Might as well use every GitHub feature I can since I’ve chosen that platform for hosting my blog, right? :)
